div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 589 Nadaselu (formerly Magyarnádás) c. (724) 17 km. NW of Cluj, Rumania, 1846 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 11 AR. Pot hoard Dyrrhachium: dr. (some frag.) Disposition: Vienna Seidl, Oester. Blätter, f. Lit. u. Kunst. 1846, p. 1058; AfÖG 9 (1853), p. 165
